duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot issues related to AR/VR graphics system level frameworks by using knowledge of Apple SOC/GPU, modern rendering architectures, and design.
Debug failures coming from both hardware and software, partnering with cross-functional engineers to quickly root cause and resolve issues.
Drive systematic improvements to debug methods, tools, and features based on findings and expertise.

education_certification.credential: BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent degree or experience
